fi.metropolia.lbs.travist.routes

Class TravistMapViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.metropolia.lbs.travist.routes.TravistMapViewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncFinished

    public class TravistMapViewAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsyncFinished
    Handles the map view. To be used from an activity or a fragment. 1. Get instance ( TravistMapViewAdapter.getInstance(); ) 2. Attach to activity / fragment ( attachTo(this); ) 3. Declare map view for activity / fragment and set ( set( MapView ..); )
    Author:
    Joni Turunen, Daniel Sanchez
